knimeNode.name: Benchmark Start (Memory Monitoring)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loop start for execution timing and monitoring memory use during loop execution

intro.p: This node provides the start of a timing block for monitoring performance of a node or nodes. It needs to be paired with a corresponding Performance Monitoring Timing End (Memory Monitoring) node.
The loop start allows the setting of a number of timing runs, and an optional timeout
NB The timeout will not halt intermediate node execution, only prevent a new iteration starting one the corresponding loop end is reached.
The memory use of the JVM during loop execution will also be recorded and made available at a port at the Loop End node
